documents.document: @Trillything Give him enough rope...
New US Secretary of State gave touchingly respectful, humble Day 1 speech to the 75k members of dept. And with some humour. Smart guy. ðŸ˜†
@Trillything Can't see him there in two years. He will go, one way or another.
@Trillything We shall see. I cannot believe this madness can continue for long.
I am heartened to think that every day that passes brings us closer to the next US president. There is no way Trump will be re-elected.
@realDonaldTrump We agreed on 1250 asylum seekers - not thousands of illegal immigrants. Getting facts right is essential, Mr Trump.
